articles.title: G20 Summit Day 2: Rajghat visit, tree planting ceremony- events scheduled for leaders on 10 September | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India hosts G20 Summit in Delhi, adopts New Delhi Leadership Declaration, announces India-Middle East-Europe economic corridor, and inducts African Union as permanent member.
articles.content: India is hosting the 18th Group of 20 or G20 Summit in national capital Delhi. The G20 leaders saw a productive day 1 on Saturday, 9 September. The important decisions taken on the first day of the G… [+3223 chars]
